properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 3 at 1:50PM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
At 150 PM EST...a strong thunderstorm was over Doyle, or near Buena
Vista...moving northeast at 45 mph.

HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind...frequent cloud to ground lightning
and heavy rain.

IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of
light...unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary
street flooding especially in poor drainage areas.

Some locations in the path of this storm include
Buena Vista, Butler, Ideal, Putnam, Murrays Crossroads, Whitewater
State Park, Rupert, Charing, Garden Valley, Tazewell, Doyle, Bartlett
and Walls Crossing.
properties.instruction:
People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear
thunder...you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists
should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to
hydroplaning.

LAT...LON 3222 8446 3235 8453 3259 8419 3233 8403
TIME...MOT...LOC 1850Z 239DEG 37KT 3232 8444

WIND...40MPH

NWSheadline: SIGNIFICANT WEATHER ADVISORY FOR NORTHWESTERN MACON...SCHLEY... SOUTHWESTERN TAYLOR AND SOUTHEASTERN MARION COUNTIES UNTIL 215 PM EST
